mapper.select: SELECT vocNUm, title, USER_NAME AS userName, REG_DATE AS regDate, PASSWORD AS password FROM ( SELECT VOC_NUM as vocNum, TITLE, USER_NAME, REG_DATE, PASSWORD AS password FROM b_edu.T_BEDU_VOC ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC ) AS subquery

SELECT VOC_NUM AS vocNUm, TITLE, USER_NAME AS userName, REG_DATE AS regDate, PASSWORD AS password FROM T_BEDU_VOC WHERE TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY VOC_NUM DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BEDU_VOC( TITLE, CONTENT, FILE_NAME, FILE_TYPE, USER_NAME, REG_DATE, REG_ID, PASSWORD )VALUES( #{title}, #{content}, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{userName}, SYSDATE(), #{regId}, #{password} )
mapper.select: SELECT VOC_NUM as vocNum, TITLE as title, CONTENT as content, FILE_NAME as fileName, FILE_TYPE as fileType, REG_DATE as regDate, USER_NAME as userName, PASSWORD as password FROM T_BEDU_VOC WHERE VOC_NUM = #{vocNum};
SELECT USER_ID as userId FROM T_BEDU_USER WHERE USER_NAME = #{userName}
SELECT USER_NAME as userName FROM T_BEDU_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS replyCnt FROM T_BEDU_REPLY WHERE VOC_NUM = #{vocNum}
